column1: # Semantics: rewrite alias→canonical ONLY for dates in [start_date
# Columns are required; dates are UTC

column6: Yahoo renamed Altaba; AABA began trading 2017-06-19

On May 31, 2018, in connection with Wyndham Worldwide’s previously announced spin-off of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc., its wholly owned subsidiary (“Wyndham Hotels”), Wyndham Worldwide changed its name to “Wyndham Destinations, Inc.”
Dr Pepper Snapple Group, Inc. (NYSE: DPS) renamed Keurig Dr Pepper Inc.; KDP ticker begins trading on NYSE 2018-07-10 after closing of Keurig merger.
